pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Grai Fivetran IntegrationThe Fivetran integration synchronizes metadata from your Fivetran instance into your Grai data lineage graph.# TestingUses `fastapi-code-generator` to generate Pydantic base models for the Fivetran API.More information about code generation can be found [here](https://github.com/koxudaxi/fastapi-code-generator).Additionally, the project Makefile can be used to generate the models.
